---
title: "JupyterHub"
number-sections: true
---

 * Login to the JupyterHub [here](https://hub.seabee.sigma2.no/) using your Feide credentials. 
 
 * Your Feide account needs to be added to the list of JupyterHub users. See the [Login](./login.qmd) page for details.
 
Describe the configuration:

 * How much "personal" storage do users have (and where is it stored)?
 * What buckets on MinIO can they access?
 * Are their files backed up?
 * What level of computing resources can they access (CPU, memory, GPU)?
 * What packages are available in the user environment (for both Python and R)?
